text: Lalit Kumar Modi, (; born November 29, 1963) Is an Indian businessman. Modi is the founder of the Indian Premier League, where he was the Chairman and Commissioner. Modi was also the Chairman of Airtel Champions League T20. Modi served as the Vice President of the Board of Cricket Control in India (BCCI) and the Punjab Cricket Association. Lalit Modi is the President and Managing Director of Modi Enterprises and the Executive Director of Godfrey Phillips India. title: Lalit Modi
